summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4151 for the improvement of Juneau Street and Kenny Street, each from Rainier Avenue to 42nd Avenue South; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49645, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
